Package ohos.data.search.schema

Class MessageItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.data.search.model.IndexData
      • ohos.data.search.schema.Schema<MessageItem>
        • ohos.data.search.schema.MessageItem

  • public final class MessageItem
extends Schema<MessageItem>
    Represents the index schema for message items.

    This schema is used to create indexes for message items. It supports index fields attachment, content, senderName, senderPhone, recipientName, recipientPhone, and all the fields in CommonItem. Among these fields, identifier is mandatory and can be set via the CommonItem#setIdentifier(String) method.

    Since:
    5
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Data#DATA_SEARCH
